title: Border, late 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Angleterre à Brides with floral and foliated sprays in allover pattern. Fond: brides. Modes: St. Esprit avec rangs clairs, portes, maille a cinq trous.
